techmeme.title: Dealogic: foreign capital in China's VC industry fell 60% YoY to $3.7B in 2023, just 10% of the 2021 peak, leading to an expansion of state-backed funds (South China Morning Post)
How Russian design firm Art Lebedev's Optimus keyboards, with built-in OLED screens in each key, laid the foundations for Elgato's popular Stream Deck (The Verge)
Fujitsu makes a "significant investment" in Cohere to build and launch Japanese-language LLMs, including "Takane", which is based on Cohere's Command R+ LLM (Shubham Sharma/VentureBeat)
Sources: the US is mulling imposing the foreign direct product rule, seen as draconian by allies, on Tokyo Electron and ASML's chip equipment business in China (Bloomberg)
Sources: GitLab, which has an ~$8B market cap, is exploring a sale after attracting interest from its peers, including Datadog, which has a $44B market cap (Reuters)
